AT.name: PokéMover
AT.description: Bestückst du dein Nintendo 3DS-System danach mit einem der Spiele Pokémon Schwarze Edition, Pokémon Weiße Edition, Pokémon Schwarze Edition 2 oder Pokémon Weiße Edition 2, kannst du mit PokéMover Pokémon aus der jeweiligen Software in deine Online-Boxen ablegen. Von dort aus lassen sie sich dann mithilfe von Pokémon Bank spielend leicht auf Pokémon X oder Pokémon Y übertragen! Bitte beachte, dass Pokémon, die auf die Online-Box übertragen wurden, nicht wieder in Pokémon Schwarze Edition, Pokémon Weiße Edition, Pokémon Schwarze Edition 2 oder Pokémon Weiße Edition 2 zurückkehren können. Hinweis: Pokémon, die mithilfe von Software erstellt wurden, welche nicht von The Pokémon Company und Nintendo lizenziert wurde, können unter Umständen nicht mit Pokémon Bank oder PokéMover gelagert oder zwischen den Online-Boxen verschoben werden.

AU.name: Poké Transporter
AU.description: When you insert a Pokémon Black Version, Pokémon White Version, Pokémon Black Version 2, and Pokémon White Version 2 Game Card into your Nintendo 3DS family system, you'll be able to use Poké Transporter to transfer Pokémon from these games into their own online Boxes. Then, you can easily transfer those Pokémon into compatible Pokémon titles using Pokémon Bank! Note that Poké Transporter cannot return Pokémon to Pokémon Black Version, Pokémon White Version, Pokémon Black Version 2, or Pokémon White Version 2 after they have been stored in an online Box. Note: You may find yourself unable to use Pokémon Bank or Poké Transporter to deposit any Pokémon created illegally by software unauthorised by The Pokémon Company and Nintendo into your online Boxes, or to move these Pokémon between online Boxes.

DE.name: PokéMover
DE.description: Bestückst du dein Nintendo 3DS-System danach mit einem der Spiele Pokémon Schwarze Edition, Pokémon Weiße Edition, Pokémon Schwarze Edition 2 oder Pokémon Weiße Edition 2, kannst du mit PokéMover Pokémon aus der jeweiligen Software in deine Online-Boxen ablegen. Von dort aus lassen sie sich dann mithilfe von Pokémon Bank spielend leicht auf Pokémon X oder Pokémon Y übertragen! Bitte beachte, dass Pokémon, die auf die Online-Box übertragen wurden, nicht wieder in Pokémon Schwarze Edition, Pokémon Weiße Edition, Pokémon Schwarze Edition 2 oder Pokémon Weiße Edition 2 zurückkehren können. Hinweis: Pokémon, die mithilfe von Software erstellt wurden, welche nicht von The Pokémon Company und Nintendo lizenziert wurde, können unter Umständen nicht mit Pokémon Bank oder PokéMover gelagert oder zwischen den Online-Boxen verschoben werden.

BE.name: Poké Transfert
BE.description: En insérant une carte de jeu de Pokémon Version Noire, Pokémon Version Blanche, Pokémon Version Noire 2 ou Pokémon Version Blanche 2 dans votre console Nintendo 3DS, vous pourrez utiliser Poké Transfert et transférer des Pokémon depuis ces jeux dans vos Boîtes en ligne. Vous pourrez ensuite les rapatrier dans Pokémon X et Pokémon Y grâce à Banque Pokémon ! ATTENTION : Poké Transfert ne permet pas de renvoyer des Pokémon de Pokémon Version Noire, Pokémon Version Blanche, Pokémon Version Noire 2 ou Pokémon Version Blanche 2 vers leur jeu d'origine une fois qu'ils sont passés par une Boîte en ligne. Note : Il est possible que vous ne puissiez pas utiliser Banque Pokémon et Poké Transfert pour stocker ou déplacer dans les Boîtes en ligne des Pokémon créés illégalement en utilisant des logiciels non autorisés par The Pokémon Company et Nintendo.

BR.name: Poké Transporter
BR.description: O Poké Transporter é um aplicativo que pode ser baixado de graça a partir do banco Pokémon Bank. Ao usar o Poké Transporter, é possível fazer a transferência de Pokémon das versões Pokémon Black, Pokémon White, Pokémon Black 2, ou Pokémon White 2 para o banco Pokémon Bank. É necessário inserir um cartão de jogo com uma das versões Pokémon Black, Pokémon White, Pokémon Black 2, ou Pokémon White 2 para fazer a transferência de Pokémon em todos os consoles da linha Nintendo 3DS. Uma vez que se usa o Poké Transporter para transferir Pokémon, este Pokémon irá desaparecer deste jogo e não poderá mais ser transferido de volta.

CY.name: Poké Transporter
CY.description: When you insert a Pokémon Black Version, Pokémon White Version, Pokémon Black Version 2, and Pokémon White Version 2 Game Card into your Nintendo 3DS family system, you'll be able to use Poké Transporter to transfer Pokémon from these games into their own online Boxes. Then, you can easily transfer those Pokémon into compatible Pokémon titles using Pokémon Bank! Note that Poké Transporter cannot return Pokémon to Pokémon Black Version, Pokémon White Version, Pokémon Black Version 2, or Pokémon White Version 2 after they have been stored in an online Box. Note: You may find yourself unable to use Pokémon Bank or Poké Transporter to deposit any Pokémon created illegally by software unauthorised by The Pokémon Company and Nintendo into your online Boxes, or to move these Pokémon between online Boxes.

HK.name: Poké Transporter
HK.description: 和心愛的Pokémon隨時隨地在一起。 『Poké Transporter』是一種下載『Pokémon Bank』後可追加免費下載的應用程式。在已插入『ポケットモンスターブラック・ホワイト・ブラック２・ホワイト２（臺灣參考名稱：神奇寶貝 黑版／白版・黑版2／白版2；香港參考名稱：寵物小精靈黑版／白版・黑版2／白版2）』遊戲卡 的Nintendo3DS主機上使用『Poké Transporter』，即可傳送Pokémon到『Pokémon Bank』中設置的，網路上自己專用的Box裡。另外，無法將已用『Poké Transporter』傳送到『Pokémon Bank』的Pokémon送回『ポケットモンスターブラック・ホワイト・ブラック２・ホワイト２（臺灣參考名稱：神奇寶貝 黑版／白版・黑版2／白版2；香港參考名稱：寵物小精靈黑版／白版・黑版2／白版2）』。

Then, you can easily transfer those Pokémon into compatible Pokémon titles using Pokémon Bank! Note that Poké Transporter cannot return Pokémon to Pokémon Black Version, Pokémon White Version, Pokémon Black Version 2, or Pokémon White Version 2 after they have been stored in an online Box. Then, you can easily transfer those Pokémon into compatible Pokémon titles using Pokémon Bank! Note that Poké Transporter cannot return Pokémon to Pokémon Black Version, Pokémon White Version, Pokémon Black Version 2, or Pokémon White Version 2 after they have been stored in an online Box. Note: You may find yourself unable to use Pokémon Bank or Poké Transporter to deposit any Pokémon created illegally by software unauthorised by The Pokémon Company and Nintendo into your online Boxes, or to move these Pokémon between online Boxes.

NL.name: Poké Transporter
NL.description: Als je een Game Card van Pokémon Black Version, Pokémon White Version, Pokémon Black Version 2, of Pokémon White Version 2 in een Nintendo 3DS-systeem plaatst, kun je met behulp van Poké Transporter de Pokémon van deze spellen naar je eigen online boxen overzetten. Vanaf daar kun je heel gemakkelijk met Pokémon Bank deze Pokémon naar Pokémon X en Pokémon Y sturen. Let op: Pokémon die je eenmaal in een online box hebt opgeslagen kun je niet meer met Poké Transporter terugsturen maar Pokémon Black Version, Pokémon White Version, Pokémon Black Version 2, of Pokémon White Version 2. Opmerking: de kans bestaat dat je Pokémon Bank of Poké Transporter niet kunt gebruiken om Pokémon die illegaal zijn gecreëerd door software die niet is geautoriseerd door de The Pokémon Company en Nintendo, naar je online boxen te sturen of deze Pokémon te verplaatsen van de ene box naar de andere.

IT.name: Pokétrasferitore
IT.description: Inserendo nella tua console Nintendo 3DS una scheda di gioco di Pokémon Versione Nera, Pokémon Versione Bianca, Pokémon Versione Nera 2 o Pokémon Versione Bianca 2, potrai usare il Pokétrasferitore per trasferire i Pokémon presenti in questi giochi nei Box online. Quindi, grazie alla Banca Pokémon, potrai trasferirli facilmente in Pokémon X e Pokémon Y. Attenzione: non potrai usare il Pokétrasferitore per riportare in Pokémon Versione Nera, Pokémon Versione Bianca, Pokémon Versione Nera 2 o Pokémon Versione Bianca 2 i Pokémon che hai trasferito nei Box online. Avvertenza: non potrai usare la Banca Pokémon o il Pokétrasferitore per depositare nei tuoi Box online Pokémon creati illegalmente con programmi non autorizzati da The Pokémon Company e Nintendo o per spostare tali Pokémon tra i Box online.

KR.name: 포켓무버
KR.description: 「포켓무버」는 「포켓몬 뱅크」와 연동하는 다운로드 소프트웨어로, 「포켓몬 뱅크」를 구입하면 추가로 무료 다운로드 받을 수 있습니다. 「포켓무버」를 이용하면, 「포켓몬스터 블랙・화이트」와 「포켓몬스터 블랙 2・화이트 2」의 포켓몬을 인터넷상의 본인 전용 박스에 전송해, 「포켓몬스터X・Y」로 손쉽게 데려올 수 있어, 전작에서 즐기던 추억이 가득한 포켓몬들과 언제까지나 함께 즐길 수 있습니다.

LU.name: Poké Transfert
LU.description: En insérant une carte de jeu de Pokémon Version Noire, Pokémon Version Blanche, Pokémon Version Noire 2 ou Pokémon Version Blanche 2 dans votre console Nintendo 3DS, vous pourrez utiliser Poké Transfert et transférer des Pokémon depuis ces jeux dans vos Boîtes en ligne. Vous pourrez ensuite les rapatrier dans Pokémon X et Pokémon Y grâce à Banque Pokémon ! ATTENTION : Poké Transfert ne permet pas de renvoyer des Pokémon de Pokémon Version Noire, Pokémon Version Blanche, Pokémon Version Noire 2 ou Pokémon Version Blanche 2 vers leur jeu d'origine une fois qu'ils sont passés par une Boîte en ligne. Note : Il est possible que vous ne puissiez pas utiliser Banque Pokémon et Poké Transfert pour stocker ou déplacer dans les Boîtes en ligne des Pokémon créés illégalement en utilisant des logiciels non autorisés par The Pokémon Company et Nintendo.

Then, you can easily transfer those Pokémon into compatible Pokémon titles using Pokémon Bank! Note that Poké Transporter cannot return Pokémon to Pokémon Black Version, Pokémon White Version, Pokémon Black Version 2, or Pokémon White Version 2 after they have been stored in an online Box. JP.name: ポケムーバー
JP.description: 『ポケムーバー』は、『ポケモンバンク』をダウンロードすると、追加で無料ダウンロードできるソフトです。『ポケットモンスターブラック･ホワイト･ブラック2･ホワイト2』のゲームカードをセットしたニンテンドー3DS本体で『ポケムーバー』を使うと、インターネット上にある自分専用のボックス「ポケモンバンク」にポケモンを転送することができます。なお、『ポケムーバー』で『ポケモンバンク』に転送したポケモンは、『ポケットモンスターブラック･ホワイト･ブラック2･ホワイト2』に戻すことはできません。

NZ.name: Poké Transporter
NZ.description: When you insert a Pokémon Black Version, Pokémon White Version, Pokémon Black Version 2, and Pokémon White Version 2 Game Card into your Nintendo 3DS family system, you'll be able to use Poké Transporter to transfer Pokémon from these games into their own online Boxes. Then, you can easily transfer those Pokémon into compatible Pokémon titles using Pokémon Bank! Note that Poké Transporter cannot return Pokémon to Pokémon Black Version, Pokémon White Version, Pokémon Black Version 2, or Pokémon White Version 2 after they have been stored in an online Box. Note: You may find yourself unable to use Pokémon Bank or Poké Transporter to deposit any Pokémon created illegally by software unauthorised by The Pokémon Company and Nintendo into your online Boxes, or to move these Pokémon between online Boxes.

Then, you can easily transfer those Pokémon into compatible Pokémon titles using Pokémon Bank! Note that Poké Transporter cannot return Pokémon to Pokémon Black Version, Pokémon White Version, Pokémon Black Version 2, or Pokémon White Version 2 after they have been stored in an online Box. Note: You may find yourself unable to use Pokémon Bank or Poké Transporter to deposit any Pokémon created illegally by software unauthorised by The Pokémon Company and Nintendo into your online Boxes, or to move these Pokémon between online Boxes.

CA.name: Poké Transporter
CA.description: Poké Transporter is an application which can be downloaded from Pokémon Bank for free. You can transfer Pokémon from your Pokémon Black Version, Pokémon White Version, Pokémon Black Version 2, or Pokémon White Version 2 to your Pokémon Bank by using Poké Transporter. In order to transfer your Pokémon, you need to insert Pokémon Black, Pokémon White, Pokémon Black 2, or Pokémon White 2 in all the systems in Nintendo 3DS family's Game Card slot. Once you use Poké Transporter to transfer Pokémon, the Pokémon will disappear from that game and cannot be transferred back.

RU.name: Poké Transporter
RU.description: Вставьте игровую карту с Pokémon Black Version, Pokémon White Version, Pokémon Black Version 2 или Pokémon White Version 2 в Nintendo 3DS, чтобы использовать Poké Transporter для переноса персонажей Pokémon из этих игр в отдельные онлайн-ячейки. А еще вы сможете без особого труда переместить своих героев в Pokémon X и Pokémon Y с помощью приложения Pokémon Bank! Сохранив персонаж Pokémon в онлайн-ячейке, вы не сможете перенести его в игры Pokémon Black Version, Pokémon White Version, Pokémon Black Version 2 или Pokémon White Version 2 с помощью Poké Transporter. Внимание: игроки, незаконно создавшие персонажей Pokémon с помощью программного обеспечения, не авторизированного The Pokémon Company и Nintendo, не смогут использовать Pokémon Bank или Poké Transporter для сохранения персонажей в онлайн-ячейках или их перемещения в другие ячейки.

SE.name: Poké Transporter
SE.description: When you insert a Pokémon Black Version, Pokémon White Version, Pokémon Black Version 2, and Pokémon White Version 2 Game Card into your Nintendo 3DS family system, you'll be able to use Poké Transporter to transfer Pokémon from these games into their own online Boxes. Then, you can easily transfer those Pokémon into compatible Pokémon titles using Pokémon Bank! Note that Poké Transporter cannot return Pokémon to Pokémon Black Version, Pokémon White Version, Pokémon Black Version 2, or Pokémon White Version 2 after they have been stored in an online Box. Note: You may find yourself unable to use Pokémon Bank or Poké Transporter to deposit any Pokémon created illegally by software unauthorised by The Pokémon Company and Nintendo into your online Boxes, or to move these Pokémon between online Boxes.

PL.name: Poké Transporter

Note that Poké Transporter cannot return Pokémon to Pokémon Black Version, Pokémon White Version, Pokémon Black Version 2, or Pokémon White Version 2 after they have been stored in an online Box. Note: You may find yourself unable to use Pokémon Bank or Poké Transporter to deposit any Pokémon created illegally by software unauthorised by The Pokémon Company and Nintendo into your online Boxes, or to move these Pokémon between online Boxes.

PT.name: Poké Transporter
PT.description: Quando inserires um cartão de jogo de Pokémon Black Version, Pokémon White Version, Pokémon Black Version 2, ou Pokémon White Version 2 numa consola Nintendo 3DS, poderás utilizar o Poké Transporter para transferires Pokémon a partir destes jogos para as suas próprias caixas na Internet. Assim, poderás transferir com facilidade esses Pokémon para Pokémon X e Pokémon Y utilizando o Pokémon Bank. Tem em atenção que o Poké Transporter não pode devolver aos jogos Pokémon Black Version, Pokémon White Version, Pokémon Black Version 2, ou Pokémon White Version 2 nenhum Pokémon que tenha sido armazenado numa caixa na Internet. Nota: Não poderás utilizar o Pokémon Bank ou o Poké Transporter para depositar nas tuas caixas na Internet quaisquer Pokémon que tenham sido criados ilegalmente por aplicações não autorizadas por The Pokémon Company e Nintendo, bem como não poderás mover entre caixas na Internet esses mesmos Pokémon.

RO.name: Poké Transporter
RO.description: When you insert a Pokémon Black Version, Pokémon White Version, Pokémon Black Version 2, and Pokémon White Version 2 Game Card into your Nintendo 3DS family system, you'll be able to use Poké Transporter to transfer Pokémon from these games into their own online Boxes. Then, you can easily transfer those Pokémon into compatible Pokémon titles using Pokémon Bank! Note that Poké Transporter cannot return Pokémon to Pokémon Black Version, Pokémon White Version, Pokémon Black Version 2, or Pokémon White Version 2 after they have been stored in an online Box. Note: You may find yourself unable to use Pokémon Bank or Poké Transporter to deposit any Pokémon created illegally by software unauthorised by The Pokémon Company and Nintendo into your online Boxes, or to move these Pokémon between online Boxes.

ES.name: Poké Trasladador
ES.description: Con la tarjeta de juego de Pokémon Edición Negra, Pokémon Edición Blanca, Pokémon Edición Negra 2 o Pokémon Edición Blanca 2 insertada en una consola Nintendo 3DS, podrás usar el Poké Trasladador para transferir Pokémon de esos juegos a cajas en línea. Así, podrás trasladarlos luego fácilmente a Pokémon X y Pokémon Y mediante el Banco de Pokémon. Ten en cuenta que el Poké Trasladador no puede llevar de vuelta a Pokémon Edición Negra, Pokémon Edición Blanca, Pokémon Edición Negra 2 o Pokémon Edición Blanca 2 aquellos Pokémon que hayas almacenado en una caja en línea. Nota: No podrás usar ni el Banco de Pokémon ni el Poké Trasladador para dejar en tus cajas en línea Pokémon que hayan sido creados de forma ilegal mediante software no autorizado por The Pokémon Company y Nintendo, ni mover dichos Pokémon entre cajas en línea.

ZA.name: Poké Transporter
ZA.description: When you insert a Pokémon Black Version, Pokémon White Version, Pokémon Black Version 2, and Pokémon White Version 2 Game Card into your Nintendo 3DS family system, you'll be able to use Poké Transporter to transfer Pokémon from these games into their own online Boxes. Then, you can easily transfer those Pokémon into compatible Pokémon titles using Pokémon Bank! Note that Poké Transporter cannot return Pokémon to Pokémon Black Version, Pokémon White Version, Pokémon Black Version 2, or Pokémon White Version 2 after they have been stored in an online Box. Note: You may find yourself unable to use Pokémon Bank or Poké Transporter to deposit any Pokémon created illegally by software unauthorised by The Pokémon Company and Nintendo into your online Boxes, or to move these Pokémon between online Boxes.

TW.name: Poké Transporter
TW.description: 和心愛的Pokémon隨時隨地在一起。 『Poké Transporter』是一種下載『Pokémon Bank』後可追加免費下載的應用程式。在已插入『ポケットモンスターブラック・ホワイト・ブラック２・ホワイト２（臺灣參考名稱：神奇寶貝 黑版／白版・黑版2／白版2；香港參考名稱：寵物小精靈黑版／白版・黑版2／白版2）』遊戲卡 的Nintendo3DS主機上使用『Poké Transporter』，即可傳送Pokémon到『Pokémon Bank』中設置的，網路上自己專用的Box裡。另外，無法將已用『Poké Transporter』傳送到『Pokémon Bank』的Pokémon送回『ポケットモンスターブラック・ホワイト・ブラック２・ホワイト２（臺灣參考名稱：神奇寶貝 黑版／白版・黑版2／白版2；香港參考名稱：寵物小精靈黑版／白版・黑版2／白版2）』。

US.name: Poké Transporter
US.description: Poké Transporter is an application which can be downloaded from Pokémon Bank for free. You can transfer Pokémon from your Pokémon Black Version, Pokémon White Version, Pokémon Black Version 2, or Pokémon White Version 2 to your Pokémon Bank by using Poké Transporter. In order to transfer your Pokémon, you need to insert Pokémon Black, Pokémon White, Pokémon Black 2, or Pokémon White 2 in all the systems in Nintendo 3DS family's Game Card slot. Once you use Poké Transporter to transfer Pokémon, the Pokémon will disappear from that game and cannot be transferred back.

MX.name: Poké Trasladador
MX.description: El Poké Trasladador es una aplicación que puede ser descargada gratuitamente desde el Banco de Pokémon. Al usar el Poké Trasladador podrás transferir Pokémon desde Pokémon Edición Negra, Pokémon Edición Blanca, Pokémon Edición Negra 2 o Pokémon Edición Blanca 2 a tu Banco de Pokémon. Para transferir tus Pokémon, es necesario insertar una tarjeta de juego de Pokémon Edición Negra, Pokémon Edición Blanca, Pokémon Edición Negra 2 o Pokémon Edición Blanca 2 en la ranura para tarjetas de juego de cualquiera de las consolas de la familia Nintendo 3DS. Una vez que transfieras un Pokémon por medio de Poké Trasladador, este desaparecerá del juego original y no se podrá transferir de regreso.

HR.name: Poké Transporter
HR.description: When you insert a Pokémon Black Version, Pokémon White Version, Pokémon Black Version 2, and Pokémon White Version 2 Game Card into your Nintendo 3DS family system, you'll be able to use Poké Transporter to transfer Pokémon from these games into their own online Boxes. Then, you can easily transfer those Pokémon into compatible Pokémon titles using Pokémon Bank! Note that Poké Transporter cannot return Pokémon to Pokémon Black Version, Pokémon White Version, Pokémon Black Version 2, or Pokémon White Version 2 after they have been stored in an online Box. Note: You may find yourself unable to use Pokémon Bank or Poké Transporter to deposit any Pokémon created illegally by software unauthorised by The Pokémon Company and Nintendo into your online Boxes, or to move these Pokémon between online Boxes.

SI.name: Poké Transporter
SI.description: When you insert a Pokémon Black Version, Pokémon White Version, Pokémon Black Version 2, and Pokémon White Version 2 Game Card into your Nintendo 3DS family system, you'll be able to use Poké Transporter to transfer Pokémon from these games into their own online Boxes. Then, you can easily transfer those Pokémon into compatible Pokémon titles using Pokémon Bank! Note that Poké Transporter cannot return Pokémon to Pokémon Black Version, Pokémon White Version, Pokémon Black Version 2, or Pokémon White Version 2 after they have been stored in an online Box. Note: You may find yourself unable to use Pokémon Bank or Poké Transporter to deposit any Pokémon created illegally by software unauthorised by The Pokémon Company and Nintendo into your online Boxes, or to move these Pokémon between online Boxes.
